          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy transformations in rocket flight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energietransformationen im Rakete Flug</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transformations d'énergie dans le vol de fusée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transformações da energia no vôo do foguete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasformazioni di energia nel volo del razzo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργειακοί μετασχηματισμοί στην πτήση πυραύλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transformaciones de la energía en vuelo del 
cohete</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the different energy transformations taking place as a rocket accelerates upwards.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transformations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heat energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die unterschiedlichen 
stattfindenen Energietransformationen, während eine Rakete aufwärts 
beschleunigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les différentes 
transformations d'énergie ayant lieu pendant qu'une fusée accélère
vers le haut.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as transformações 
diferentes da energia que ocorrem enquanto um foguete acelera para 
cima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le trasformazioni 
differenti di energia che avvengono mentre un razzo accelerare verso 
l'alto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει διαφορετικούς 
ενεργειακούς μετασχηματισμούς που πραγματοποιούνται καθώς ένας 
πύραυλος επιταχύνει προς τα πάνω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las diversas 
transformaciones de la energía que ocurren mientras que un cohete 
acelera hacia arriba.</string>
          </description>
